metadata.title: How to Make a YouTube Banner 2025: Channel Art Guide
metadata.description: Create an effective YouTube channel banner. Dimensions, design tips, and free tools.

hero.headline: How to Make a YouTube Banner
hero.subheadline: First impression of your channel. Clean design, right dimensions, clear branding.

sections.content: Your YouTube banner is the billboard of your channel—viewers see it on every page. Good channel art establishes brand identity and communicates what your channel offers. Here's how to create a banner that works across all devices.

content.title: Full Size: 2560 x 1440px
content.description: Upload at this size. Covers all display scenarios.

content.title: Safe Area: 1546 x 423px
content.description: Center content here. Visible on all devices including mobile.

content.title: TV Display
content.description: Full banner shows on TV app. Keep edges clean.

sections.title: Creating Your Banner
content: Place critical elements in safe zone

content.title: Your Photo/Avatar
content.description: Optional but builds recognition. Consistent with profile picture.

content.title: Channel Name
content.description: Clear, readable text. Your brand identity.

faq.question: What size should YouTube banner be?
faq.answer: Upload 2560 x 1440 pixels. Keep important elements within center 1546 x 423 pixels (safe zone visible on all devices).

faq.question: Best free tool for banners?
faq.answer: Canva is easiest with YouTube banner templates. Photopea for more control. Both free and browser-based.

faq.question: How often to update banner?
faq.answer: When branding changes or seasonally if relevant to your content. Some creators update for special series or events.

faq.question: Should I include my face?
faq.answer: Optional. Helps recognition and personal connection. Many successful channels don't show face in banner. Match your brand.
